description: A girl named Strawberry Shortcake, along with her cat Custard and dog Pupcake, has adventures in friendship in Strawberryland.
name: Strawberry Shortcake

original_info.id: Strawberry Shortcake: Spring for Strawberry Shortcake_2002
original_info.name: Strawberry Shortcake: Spring for Strawberry Shortcake

review.name: Great childhood cartoon
review.reviewBody: I loved this as a kid. My favorite episodes are Berry Fairy Tales, Cooking Up Fun, Rockaberry Roll, Berry Merry Christmas, and the one with Strawberry's old friend, Lime Light. My favorite character was the French girl, Crapes Suzette. I also liked Ginger Snap and Angel Cake, who are more major in the series. The animation is good, and they teach good morals as well. The songs are catchy and fun, and there is a wide variety of bright, fruity colors. I remember when the new series, Berry Bitty Adventures came out, I was really angry. But after watching some episodes, I began to like that one too. But this will always be my favorite. 10/10.
